tasks.title: Research: Refactor large tool files for better maintainability
tasks.description:
Research and analysis required for implementing: "Refactor large tool files for better maintainability"

tasks.title: Create comprehensive test suite for Make.com FastMCP server
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive test coverage for the FastMCP server. Current coverage is only 1.36% with zero coverage for all tool files. Need to create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all major components including tools, middleware, API client, and server functionality.
